descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer for the Archmage robes fit to the ADEC body, using the \"a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE - by Cotyounoyume\"

All credit goes to Cotyounoyume for the original work on the vanilla and Acdale for his amazing ADEC body. You do not need the original files or esp or anything. This is a replacer for the vanilla FEMALE archmage robes. You will need a physics skeleton, since it has bouncies.

DROP THIS IN YOUR DATA FOLDER, if you\'re downloading this you obviously know what you\'re doing. I won\'t hand hold and tell you how to do it, that\'s what the numerous tutorials are for.

No I won\'t fit to any other bodies. No I won\'t do anything with it. If you think you can improve it you\'re welcome to it. 

Long live ADEC!
author: Abusive Cotyounoyume
